attributes.action: Colour of new Red Flex 'stealth' speed cameras
attributes.additional_details:
The new 'stealth' speed cameras (Red Flex Ltd) are painted grey, contravening the 2013 standard, SN350, authored by Louise Butcher, stating the signage and colouring of speed cameras in the UK.

By painting these grey you are simply continuing the 'War on the Motorist' which the Prime Minister stated that this government was going to end!

It is sneaky and underhanded doing this!

The standard can be easily found here: https://www.google.co.uk/#q=UK+Government+standard+350+speed+cameras

On conspicuity, it states:
'should be coloured yellow either by painting both the front and back of the housing or covering both the front and back of the housing with retro-reflective sheeting'.

The Government must implement it's own standards for the signage and colouring of these new cameras.
